name: Five Nights at Annoying Orange
description: Today is the big day. Annoying Orange will be shown to the public in an exclusive in-person view. One issue. You are not monitoring the Annoying Orange as he performs for the children. You are monitoring the Annoying Orange in the maintenance office as you file important business paper. Annoying Orange does not like visitors. You will need to reset fan to stay cool. Orange will try to find you. Will you survive?
